channel.title: Client Problems
channel.description:
Hello, I'm going to try to be descriptive as possible while explaining this. Please ask for additional details if you need them. So, for all clients I play, there is this little problem. When I first load the client and I start logging in, it takes forever to load. "Loading please wait.." For about 1-2 minutes. Now, this comes weird to me since I can play Webclients and Runescape just fine, without it loading slow. This is for any client, 317-525, and so forth. It just takes forever to load. If someone has a good fix for this, please post. Also, for 317's, this is where the major problem is. When I get onto a 317 client, I can't move without it crashing. As soon as I take a few steps in any direction it crashes. It does this for all 317 client's I have played. I really hope you guys can help me out. If you need more information on this then I will post it. Oh, and I have a 508, 525, Runesape, and 317 cache in my C:\ drive. I also have JDK downloaded and paths set.
Thanks for reading, Xx R A G 3 R.

item.title: Client Problems
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

Hello, I’m going to try to be descriptive as possible while explaining this. Please ask for additional details if you need them. So, for all clients I play, there is this little problem. When I first load the client and I start logging in, it takes forever to load. “Loading please wait…” For about 1-2 minutes. Now, this comes weird to me since I can play Webclients and Runescape just fine, without it loading slow. This is for any client, 317-525, and so forth. It just takes forever to load. If someone has a good fix for this, please post. Also, for 317’s, this is where the major problem is. When I get onto a 317 client, I can’t move without it crashing. As soon as I take a few steps in any direction it crashes. It does this for all 317 client’s I have played. I really hope you guys can help me out. If you need more information on this then I will post it. Oh, and I have a 508, 525, Runesape, and 317 cache in my C:\ drive. I also have JDK downloaded and paths set.

Thanks for reading,
Xx R A G 3 R.
